page.description: The .FIND_NEXT() method repeats the Find by Form, finding the next record.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example finds the second record in the Customer table of AlphaSports that has a lastname value equal to "McDonald".
section.example: dim frm as P frm = form.view("Customer Information") frm.find_by_form() frm.lastname.activate() frm.lastname.value = "McDonald" frm.find_run() frm.find_next() frm.find_exit()
